title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 92.5 - Generally accepted actuarial methods
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 92.5 - Generally accepted actuarial methods

State Regulations

The term generally accepted actuarial method, as such term is
used in sections 4 and 9 of chapter 641 of the Laws of 1984 shall not include
any method which results or may result in the addition of unpaid credit service
charge amounts to the outstanding principal indebtedness under the contract or
obligation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
92.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
